measured_by: proportion of cooperative choices in the Public Goods Game
justification: "Prosocial tendencies were measured as the proportion of cooperative PGG decisions made by each participant."

measured_by: amount given in the Dictator Game
justification: "As an independent measure of prosociality, participants played two dictator games… The amount given to both groups was averaged into an overall measure of prosociality."

measured_by: difference between estimated cooperation percentages for the two schools (slider bar ratings)
justification: "Using a slider bar, participants estimated the percentage of students that cooperated from each school. We took the difference between these scores for each participant to compute a measure of norm-detection."

measured_by: binary give vs. keep decisions in the Public Goods Game
justification: Participants' cooperation on each PGG trial (give vs. keep) served as the behavioral index of cooperative choice used throughout analyses.
